title: How to turn off the FPS on the right hand corner ?? but showing the ping??
body:
I wonder can I turn off the FPS but let the ping stay
while cltr F only turn both off??

replies.body:
So I went ahead and reached out to our Tech Team to see if it was possible to have one without the other, and you can not :( 

Kind of like our furry friends here: 

http://imgur.com/a/U9hbA
